USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Script to update CIF UDF field 06 based on limiit sharing box (loan detail udf 34) being checked or not checked.
NLSApp.SetFocus ("LOAN_NUMBER") LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanref= NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") CIFNo1 =NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER")
strSQL1 ="SELECT count(acctrefno) FROM cif_loan_relationship WHERE acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'"
COCIFYN = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL1)
strSQL2 ="SELECT cif.cifnumber " & _ "FROM cif_loan_relationship clr, cif cif " & _ "WHERE clr.cifno = cif.cifno " & _ "AND relationship_code_id = '1' " & _ "AND clr.acctrefno = '" & loanref & "'"
CIFNo2 = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(strSQL2)
If NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF34") = "CHECK" THEN LimistShareYN = "1" ELSE LimistShareYN = "0" END IF
XMLA = "<NLS>" XMLB = "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=" & chr(34) & CIFNo1 & chr(34) & " Entity=""INDIVIDUAL""><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail6=" & chr(34) & LimistShareYN & chr(34) & "/>" XMLC = "</CIF>" &CHR(13) & "</NLS>"
xmlstrng1 = XMLA & CHR(13) & XMLB & CHR(13) & XMLC
ImportXML(xmlstrng1)
If Not COCIFYN = 0 Then XMLD = "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=" & chr(34) & CIFNo2 & chr(34) & " Entity=""INDIVIDUAL""><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail6=" & chr(34) & LimistShareYN & chr(34) & "/>" xmlstrng2 = XMLA & CHR(13) & XMLD & CHR(13) & XMLC
ImportXML(xmlstrng2)
End If
'NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF43",xmlstrng & CHR(13) & NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF34")
Function ImportXML(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then NLSApp.MessageBox(xml & CHR(13) & NLSApp.GetErrorString()) End If ImportXML = NLSApp.GetErrorString() & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("ECOA Status Updated.") ImportXML = "" End If End Function
NLSApp.SaveScreen() **###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**
USERDEFFIELDS.object_def: <UDF StaticLeftPos="20" StaticTopPos="236" StaticWidth="98" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="129" FieldTopPos="236" FieldWidth="249" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="484" ScreenWidth="1101" ZOrder="44" ReadOnly="0"/>

<UDF StaticLeftPos="942" StaticTopPos="354" StaticWidth="126" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="1076" FieldTopPos="354" FieldWidth="311" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="646" ScreenWidth="1391" ZOrder="45" ReadOnly="0"/>

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Activate CnD" Script="'FFLS-379 Add Cease and Desist Button ' 1. Remove loan statements from loan setup ' 2. Remove email address from Communication Preferences ' 3. Remove all alerts from Communication Preferences ' 4. Obfuscate borrower and co-borrower email to [borrower@ffn1.com]@cnd (for tracking) 'FFLS-656 Remove Scripting that Disables Statements for CND ' 1. Comment out SQL update lines that effect communication preferences
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Are Sure you want to Activate a Cease and Desist for this loan?" & chr(13) & "This can only be undone manually.") Then 'Set variables loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") cifnumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") cocifnumber = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT c2.cifnumber , c2.email, c2.email2 from loanacct l, cif c2, cif_loan_relationship clr where c2.cifno = clr.cifno and l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno) email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() email2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
'1-3 SQL to update loan setup and communication cndsqlupdates = "SELECT 0; " & _ "UPDATE loanacct_setup SET statement1_code = 0, statement2_code = 0, late_fee_code = 0 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "--DELETE from LoanCommunicationAddress WHERE LoanCommunicationPreferencesID IN (SELECT LoanCommunicationPreferencesID FROM LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & ")" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE LoanCommunicationPreferences SET LateNoticeOptionFlags = 0 from LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct SET collection_officer_no = 0 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno
'Run UPDATES NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cndsqlupdates)
'Add Loan Status change to "CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE" loanxmlstring = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & loanrefno & _ """><LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE"" EffectiveDate=""" & NOW() & """/></LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>"
'4 Updates to obfuscate email addresses ImportXML(loanxmlstring) If Not cocifnumber = "" Then cocifxmlstring = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cocifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>" ImportXML(cocifxmlstring) End if
NLSApp.RefreshScreen() Else NLSApp.MessageBox("CnD Canceled.") End if"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.object_def: <UDF StaticLeftPos="271" StaticTopPos="120" StaticWidth="93" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="531" FieldTopPos="29" FieldWidth="108" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="484" ScreenWidth="1101" ZOrder="48" ReadOnly="0"/>

<UDF StaticLeftPos="485" StaticTopPos="389" StaticWidth="123" StaticHeight="20" FieldLeftPos="615" FieldTopPos="389" FieldWidth="313" FieldHeight="20" TabOrder="-1" ScreenHeight="646" ScreenWidth="1391" ZOrder="49" ReadOnly="0"/>

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Bankruptcy Notice" Script="'###Loan Detail 1 UDF33 'on Button click option selection 'Creates a Bankruptcy TASK
loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'ACTIVE BK TASK lookup activeBKtsksql = "select count(t.task_refno) from task t, task_template tt, task_status_codes tsc" & chr(13) & _ "where t.task_template_no = tt.task_template_no and t.status_code_id = tsc.status_code_id" & chr(13) & _ "and tt.task_template_name in ('BANKRUPTCY')" & chr(13) & _ "and status_code not in ('BK-DISMISSED','BK-COMPLETED','BK-INVALID','BK-DISSCHARGED') and nls_refno = " & loanrefno
activeBKtsk = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(activeBKtsksql)
'If there are no active BK tasks(Statuses TBD) process request If activeBKtsk = 0 Then NLSApp.SaveScreen() addBKTask (loanrefno) Else NLSApp.Messagebox("Canceling request." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "This loan already has an active bankruptcy notice in the processing queue." & chr(13) & "Please contact the Bankrupcy Administration group.") End if
'------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'SUB Sub addBKTask (loanrefno) 'LOAN variables loanstatus1 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") loanstatus2 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS_SECONDARY") loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") Userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo( )
'Task variables templateno = TEMPLATE_NUM_BANKRUPTCY defaulttskstatus = TEMPLATE_STATUS_BK_NOTICE workqueue = TEMPLATE_QUEUE_BANKRUPTCY
'Who is supplying the notice? sourcepromt = "Who is giving the Bankruptcy Notice?" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "A - Attorney" & chr(13) & _ "B - Borrower and or Co-Borrower" & chr(13) & "C - Correspondence" & chr(13) & "D - FirstSweep" & chr(13) & "E - Other" sourcecode = noticesource(UCase(InputBox(sourcepromt, "BK-Notice Source", "A"))) If sourcecode = -1 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Notice Canceled or Invalid Selection." & chr(13) & "Please Try Again.") Exit sub End if 'Atty name and Phone? attypromt1 = "Enter The Attorney's name" & chr(13) & "(Optional if you have the Court Case#.)" & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "Hit [OK] if you have the Case# but no attorney Information." & chr(13) & "If you do not know either, hit [Cancel]." attypromt2 = "Enter The Attorney's phone number." & chr(13) & "(10 digits only.)" attypromt3 = "Please enter the court case#." & chr(13) & "(Optional if you have entered the attorney's name.)" & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "If you do not have it hit [OK] to proceed or [Cancel] to quit." attypromt4 = "A valid phone# is required when an attorney name is supplied." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Entry MUST be 10 digits and all numeric."
attypromt1 = "Enter The Attorney's name and Click [OK]" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "OR" & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "Click [OK] if you only know the Case#." & chr(13) & "If you do not know either, Click [Cancel]." attypromt2 = "Enter The Attorney's phone number." & chr(13) & "(10 digits only.)" attypromt3 = "Enter the court Case# and Click [OK]." & chr(13)& chr(13) &_ "If you do not have it, Click [Cancel]." attypromt4 = "A valid phone# is required when an attorney name is supplied." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "Entry MUST be 10 digits and all numeric."
'Either Attorney name or case# is required or the process is aborted attyname = InputBox(attypromt1, "Attorney", "Enter Attorney")
If not attyname = "" and not attyname = "Enter Attorney" Then
Do validphone = 0 attyphone = InputBox(attypromt2, "Attorney Phone", "#########") if IsNumeric(attyphone) = True and len(attyphone) = 10 Then validphone = 1 Else
If MsgBox (attypromt4, 21,"Invalid Phone Number!") = 2 Then 'If user selects [Cancel] NLSApp.Messagebox("Canceling.") Exit Sub End If End if Loop until validphone = 1
caseno = InputBox(attypromt3, "Case #", "")
'combine all attorney info into a formatted text string AttyInfo = attyname & chr(13) & " (" & left(attyphone,3) & ") " & Mid(attyphone,4,3) & _ "-" & right(attyphone,4) Else If attyname = "" Then NLSApp.Messagebox("Canceling.") Exit Sub Else caseno = InputBox(attypromt3, "Case #", "") End if
End if
If attyname = "Enter Attorney" and caseno = "" Then NLSApp.Messagebox("Attorney Name and Phone Number OR Case # are required to accept a bankruptcy notice and start the process." & chr(13) & chr(13) &"Canceling.") Exit Sub End if
'Get loan borrower and co-borrower detail functions borrowerinfo = getborrowercifdetails (loanrefno) & getborrowerphndetails (loanrefno) coborrowerinfo = getcoborrowercifdetails (loanrefno) & getcoborrowerphndetails (loanrefno) If coborrowerinfo = "" Then coborrowerinfo = "N/A" End if
'Build the Task If not buildBKTask (loanrefno,templateno,defaulttskstatus,workqueue,Userno,sourcecode,borrowerinfo,coborrowerinfo,AttyInfo,caseno) = -1 Then 'Add loan status NLSApp.SetSecondaryLoanStatus loanrefno,NOW(),LOAN_STATUS_BK_NOTICE,"ADD" NLSApp.RefreshScreen() End if
End Sub
'------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'FUNCTIONS
Function getborrowercifdetails (refno) 'Looks up loan primary contact details (required) lookupdetailssql = "select 'Contact Number: ' + c.cifnumber + char(13) + 'Entry Date: ' + convert(char(11),c.setupdate) + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'Name: ' + c.firstname1 + ' ' +c.lastname1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "case when street_address2 is null Then '' Else street_address2 + char(13) end + " & chr(13) & _ "city + ', ' + state + ' ' + zip + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL1 :' + case when c.email is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL2 :' + case when c.email2 is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c " & chr(13) & _ "where l.cifno = c.cifno " & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno
getborrowercifdetails = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql) End function
Function getcoborrowercifdetails (refno) 'Looks up loan secondary contact details if they exist. Returns NULL if not lookupdetailssql = "select 'Contact Number: ' + c.cifnumber + char(13) + 'Entry Date: ' + convert(char(11),c.setupdate) + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'Name: ' + c.firstname1 + ' ' +c.lastname1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "case when street_address2 is null Then '' Else street_address2 + char(13) end + " & chr(13) & _ "city + ', ' + state + ' ' + zip + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL1 :' + case when c.email is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) + " & chr(13) & _ "'EMAIL2 :' + case when c.email2 is null then '' else c.email end + char(13) " & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr " & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and clr.cifno = c.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno
getcoborrowercifdetails = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql) End function
Function getborrowerphndetails (refno) 'Looks up loan secondary contact details if they exist. Returns NULL if not lookupdetailssql = "select distinct phone_raw + " & chr(13) & _ "case when primary_flag = 1 Then ' Primary' Else ' ' + (case when comments is null then '' else comments end) end,primary_flag" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c" & chr(13) & _ "left outer join cif_phone_nums cp" & chr(13) & _ "on c.cifno = cp.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "where l.cifno = c.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "and len(cp.phone_raw) in (10,12,11)" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno & chr(13) & _ "order by primary_flag desc"
phoneheader = chr(13) & "Phone Number(s)/Type" currphn = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql)
If not IsNull(currphn) = True Then Do until currphn = "***END OF RESULT***"
phonelist = phonelist & chr(13) & currphn currphn = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop Else phonelist = "N/A" End if getborrowerphndetails = phoneheader & phonelist
End function
Function getcoborrowerphndetails (refno) 'Looks up loan secondary contact details if they exist. Returns NULL if not lookupdetailssql = "select distinct phone_raw + " & chr(13) & _ "case when primary_flag = 1 Then ' Primary' Else ' ' + case when comments is null then '' else comments end end,primary_flag" & chr(13) & _ "from loanacct l, cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr " & chr(13) & _ "left outer join cif_phone_nums cp " & chr(13) & _ "on clr.cifno = cp.cifno " & chr(13) & _ "where l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno " & chr(13) & _ "and clr.cifno = c.cifno" & chr(13) & _ "and len(phone_raw) in (10,12)" & chr(13) & _ "and l.acctrefno = " & refno & chr(13) & _ "order by primary_flag desc"
phoneheader = chr(13) & "Phone Number(s)/Type" currphn = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupdetailssql)
If not IsNull(currphn) = True Then Do until currphn = "***END OF RESULT***"
phonelist = phonelist & chr(13) & currphn currphn = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop Else phonelist = "N/A" End if
getcoborrowerphndetails = phoneheader & phonelist End function
Function buildBKTask (refno,tasktemplateno,status,queue,uidno,source,BoInfo,CoInfo,AttyInfo,filecasealphanum) 'TASK OBJECT CREATION Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(tasktemplateno) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = status Task.NLSRefno = refno Task.WorkQueueCodeID = queue Task.CreatorUID = uidno Task.UDF1 = source Task.UDF4 = BoInfo Task.UDF5 = CoInfo Task.UDF22 = filecasealphanum Task.UDF23 = AttyInfo
If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created.") buildBKTask = -1 Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Bankruptcy TASK created and added to BK Queue for processing.") buildBKTask = "" End If
end Function
Function noticesource(sourcecode) Select Case sourcecode Case "A" source = "Attorney" Case "B" source = "Customer" Case "C" source = "Correspondence" Case "D" source = "First Sweep" Case "E" source = "Other" Case Else source = -1 End Select noticesource = source End Function"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Activate CnD" Script="If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Are you sure you want to Activate a Cease and Desist for this loan?" & chr(13) & "This can only be undone manually.") Then loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") cifnumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") cocifnumber = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT c2.cifnumber , c2.email, c2.email2 from loanacct l, cif c2, cif_loan_relationship clr where c2.cifno = clr.cifno and l.acctrefno = clr.acctrefno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno) email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() email2 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
cndsqlupdates = "SELECT 0; " & _ "UPDATE loanacct_setup SET statement1_code = 0, statement2_code = 0, late_fee_code = 0 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "DELETE from LoanCommunicationAddress WHERE LoanCommunicationPreferencesID IN (SELECT LoanCommunicationPreferencesID FROM LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & ")" & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE LoanCommunicationPreferences SET StatementOptionFlags = 0, LateNoticeOptionFlags = 0 from LoanCommunicationPreferences WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno & chr(13) & _ "UPDATE loanacct SET collection_officer_no = 40 WHERE acctrefno = " & loanrefno
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(cndsqlupdates)
'Add Loan Status change to CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE loanxmlstring = "<NLS><LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" AcctRefno=""" & loanrefno & _ """><LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""CEASE AND DESIST ACTIVE"" EffectiveDate=""" & NOW() & """/></LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "<CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>"
ImportXML(loanxmlstring) If Not cocifnumber = "" Then cocifxmlstring = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag=""1"" CIFNumber=""" & cocifnumber & """ EmailAddress1=""" & email1 & "@cnd"" EmailAddress2=""" & email2 & "@cnd""/></NLS>" ImportXML(cocifxmlstring) End if NLSApp.MessageBox("Cease and Desist has been Activated for " & NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") & ".") NLSApp.RefreshScreen() Else NLSApp.MessageBox("CnD Canceled.") End if"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Categories update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF22 (C+ and F+ Portfolio) Field label name Categories ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to maintain correct communications loan pref when borrowerer and coborrower is reported deseased or BK reported or BK confirmed. ' ' Created: 04/18/2016 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History 06/30/2017 by Stanley Muhammad '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' LoanDetailudfF22Update()
Sub LoanDetailudfF22Update() loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") loancif = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") loanport = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") udf22 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF22") status = " "
lateflag = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select LateNoticeOptionFlags from LoanCommunicationPreferences where acctrefno = " & loanref) optin = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select CASE WHEN l.portfolio_code_id = 0 THEN ld.userdef18 else ld.userdef17 END from loanacct_detail ld, loanacct l where l.acctrefno = ld.acctrefno and l.acctrefno = " & loanref)
If optin = 1 Then alert = " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType='LateNotice' OptionFlags='1'/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" Else alert = " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType='LateNotice' OptionFlags='3'/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" end if
If udf22 = "DECEASED CO-BORROWER" Then 'Delete co-borrower Email address from loan communication preferences loancocif = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select cifno from cif_loan_relationship where acctrefno = " & loanref) If loancocif <> "" Then coborroweremail = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email from cif where cifno = " & loancocif) email = " <EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESS Operation='DELETE' Address='" & coborroweremail & "'/>" & chr(13) & _ " </EMAILADDRESSES>" End If End If
If udf22 = "DECEASED BORROWER" Then 'Delete borrower Email address from loan communication preferences borroweremail = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email from cif where cifnumber = '" & loancif & "'") email = " <EMAILADDRESSES>" & chr(13) & _ " <EMAILADDRESS Operation='DELETE' Address='" & borroweremail & "'/>" & chr(13) & _ " </EMAILADDRESSES>" End If
If udf22 = "BK-AWAITING CONFIRMATION" Or udf22 = "BK-CONFIRMED" Then 'Disable printing, email and SMS options from loan communication preferences 'status = " <LOANSTATUSES Operation=""ADD"" LoanStatusCode=""DISABLESTMTS"" EffectiveDate=""" & now() & """/>" ***Future potential enhancement** alert = " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType='LateNotice' OptionFlags='0'/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>"
End If
xmlstrng = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag = '1' AcctRefno ='" & loanref & "'>" & chr(13) & _ status & chr(13) & _ " <COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ email & chr(13) & _ alert & chr(13) & _ " </COMMUNICATION> " & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng)
End Sub 'When Field Changes 'On Field Refresh 'On Initialize 'On Button click/Box check-uncheck 'Form Level Script------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before save 'Before Activate 'Before Create 'On Delete 'After Save 'After Create 'On Add Button Clicked 'Local Functions **###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###** replookup()
Sub replookup() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Adds list of debt settlemtn company representatives associated with selected company for LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21 to drop down options 'in LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22. 'Triggered when LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21 field changes. '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''
currco = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21") repcountsql = "select count(row_id) from cif c, cif_cif_relationship ccr where c.cifno = ccr.cifno1 and c.company = '" & currco & "'" repcount = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(repcountsql) repnamesql = "select c2.shortname from cif c, cif_cif_relationship ccr, cif c2 " & _ "where c.cifno = ccr.cifno1 and c2.cifno = ccr.cifno2 and c.company = '" & currco & "'" indexcount = 0 repname = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(repnamesql) indexx = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If len(repname) = 0 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("The company, " & currco & ", currently has no representatives assigned to it." & chr(13) & "Please select another company or go to CONTACTS to add a representative.") Exit Sub End If
Do NLSapp.AddComboString "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF22", indexcount, repname
repname = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() indexx = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() indexcount = indexcount + 1 Loop While CDbl(indexcount) < CDbl(repcount)
End Sub**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**NLSapp.LoadComboList 0, "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF21", "select company from cif where cifnumber like '%DSC%'"**###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'###UDF21 'When Field Changes (Start a Loan Modification Request) 'Creates a loan mod TASK
'LOAN variables loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") getmodtype = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF21") loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'Task variables templateno = TEMPLATE_NUM_LOAN_MODIFICATIONS_II defaultstatusno = TEMPLATE_STATUS_STARTED queue = TEMPLATE_QUEUE_MODIFICATIONS
'Change Start a Loan Modification Request field (UDF21) back to default "Choose an Option" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF21", "Choose an Option" NLSApp.RefreshScreen()
If Not getmodtype = "Choose an Option" Then If addloanMod(getmodtype, loanrefno, loanstatus) = "" Then End If End If NLSApp.SaveScreen()
Function addloanMod(modtype, loanrefno, status)
'TASK variables currate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(7,2),current_interest_rate))+'%' from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currpmt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT '$' + convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(9,2), next_payment_total_amount)) from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currdate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(char(10),getdate(),111)") currdatetime = NOW() hardship = "Choose an Option"
'User input for modification requestor Optins a. borrower, b. co-borrower, c. 3rd party requestpromt = "Who is requesting the " & getmodtype & "?" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "A - Borrower" & chr(13) & "B - Co-Borrower" & chr(13) & "C - Third party" requestorcode = InputBox(requestpromt, "Requestor", "A")
'Borrower/Co-borrower detail sql lookups borrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, loanacct l where l.cifno = c.cifno and l.acctrefno = " & loanrefno coborrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr where clr.cifno = c.cifno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno
'Previous approved deferral lookup prevdeflookupsql = "SELECT count(t.task_refno) from task t, task_detail td where t.task_refno = td.task_refno AND t.status_code_id = 8 AND t.task_template_no = 7 AND td.userdef01 = 'Deferral' AND t.NLS_refno = " & loanrefno
Select Case requestorcode Case "A", "a" requestor = "Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(borrowerlookupsql) Case "B", "b" requestor = "Co-Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(coborrowerlookupsql) If requestordetail = "" Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Co-Borrower information cannot be located." & chr(13) & "Please validate that Co-borrower exists and Retry.") NLSApp.MessageBox("Operation Canceled.") Exit Function End If Case "C", "c" requestor = "Third_Party (See Notes)" requestordetail = "ENTER 3rd Party details here." Case "" NLSApp.MessageBox("Modification Canceled.") Exit Function Case Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid Selection." & chr(13) & "Please Try Again.") Exit Function End Select
SELECT CASE getmodtype CASE "Deferral" 'Look up the # of previously approved deferrals prevdefs = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(prevdeflookupsql) CASE "SCRA" 'auto-pop udf2 with SCRA hardship = "SCRA" END SELECT
'TASK OBJECT CREATION If status = "ACTIVE" Then Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(templateno) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = defaultstatusno Task.WorkQueueCodeID = queue Task.NLSRefno = loanrefno Task.UDF1 = modtype Task.UDF2 = hardship Task.UDF9 = prevdefs Task.UDF10 = currpmt Task.UDF12 = currdate Task.UDF14 = currate Task.UDF18 = requestor Task.UDF23 = currdate Task.UDF25 = requestordetail
If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created.") addloanMod = -1 Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Loan Modification TASK created." & Chr(13) & "Please go the the Task Tab to complete the modification record.") addloanMod = "" End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("The Loan must be in ACTIVE status to add a Modification task") End If
End Function**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Run WC Emails" Script="If Weekday(NOW()) < 6 Then NLSapp.ScriptOn(false) FPAutoemailWC() NLSapp.ScriptOn(true) Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Welcome Call Email Processing only allowed Mon - Thu." & chr(13) & "Canceling.") End if
Sub FPAutoemailWC() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Automate the Welcome Call request FFLS-86, 87, 88 https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-86, https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-87, https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-88 'Updated via FFLS-265 https://billsdev.atlassian.net/browse/FFLS-265 ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' sqlpart2 = "FROM cif_detail cd, cif c Where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'SUB WC EMAIL AUTO()'" emailfromaddr = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef01 " & sqlpart2) serverName = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef02 " & sqlpart2) wcloanssql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef18 " & sqlpart2) attempt1message = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef03 " & sqlpart2) attempt2message = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef04 " & sqlpart2) attempt3message = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef05 " & sqlpart2) loanstoprocesssql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT userdef35 " & sqlpart2) loanstoprocess = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(loanstoprocesssql) loannumb = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(wcloanssql)
processmsg1 = "There are " & loanstoprocess & " loans to process at this time." processmsg2 = "Do you want to process all " & loanstoprocess & " loans?"
'-------Proccessing payload warning------------------- 'If there are no loans to process, cancel 'If user selectes to process all available loans, skip user input and got to processing 'If user selects to process a specific # of loans, Loop input until user selects Cancel ' OR entry is a number between 0 and the # of loans available to process
If CDbl(loanstoprocess) >= 1 Then If MsgBox(processmsg1 & chr(13) & processmsg2, 4, "WARNING! Processing payload.") = 7 Then validcnt = 0 Do processmax = InputBox(invalidText & "Please Enter the number of loans to Process." & chr(13) & "Click Cancel to quit." , "Set Processing size.", loanstoprocess) invalidText = "Invalid quantity/value entered." & chr(13) & "Entry must be a number between 0 and " & loanstoprocess & chr(13) & chr(13) If processmax <> "" Then If isnumeric(processmax) = True Then If CDbl(processmax) > 0 And CDbl(processmax) <= CDbl(loanstoprocess) Then loanstoprocess = processmax validcnt = 1 End If End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Canceling Welcome Call processing.") Exit sub End if Loop Until validcnt = 1 End If NLSApp.MessageBox(loanstoprocess & " loans will be processed.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("There are no loans to process." & chr(13) & "Canceling Welcome Call Email processing.") End If
'-------Begin welcome call Proccessing. Lcount = 0
'Repeat process for each loan based on quantity previously selected Do Until CDbl(Lcount) = CDbl(loanstoprocess)
emailtoaddr = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() borrowername = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() Riskcode = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() attemptno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() emailfromaddr = "customersupport@freedomplus.com" serverName = "Servicing FPlus"
If attemptno = "EMAIL - ATTEMPT 1" Then attemptmessage = attempt1message End If
If attemptno = "EMAIL - ATTEMPT 2" Then attemptmessage = attempt2message End If
If attemptno = "EMAIL - ATTEMPT 3" Then attemptmessage = attempt3message End If
emailbody = "Dear " & borrowername & "," & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & attemptmessage
'----Send email
'?????? UnComment next 3rows for testing email sending. Add comments for go-live?????? 'emailtoaddr = "stanley.muhammad@gmail.com" 'emailfromaddr = "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com" 'serverName = "Loan Servicing3" '************************************************************************************
NLSApp.SendEmailMessage serverName, emailtoaddr, emailfromaddr, "Welcome to FreedomPlus", emailbody ' NLSApp.SendEmailMessage serverName, "stanley.muhammad@gmail.com", emailfromaddr, "Welcome to FreedomPlus", emailbody
'----Xml import 'Updates 2 fields in the Loan Detail tab and savesa a comment that represents the text of the email sent
emailxml = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>" & chr(13) & _ "<NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & loannumb & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANDETAIL1 UserDefined11=""" & attemptno & """ UserDefined12=""" & NOW() & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANCOMMENTS Date=""" & NOW() & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""WC Activity"" " & _ "Comment=""" & attemptno & CHR(13) & "SENT TO: " & emailtoaddr & CHR(13) & emailbody & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
ImportXML(emailxml)
'---XML example---- '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> '<NLS EnforceTagExistence="1"> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="APP-001234567"> ' <LOANDETAIL1 UserDefined11="EMAIL - ATTEMPT 3" UserDefined12="06/21/2017"/> ' <LOANCOMMENTS Date="06/21/2017" Category="SERVICING NOTES" CommentDescription="WC Activity" 'Comment="EMAIL - ATTEMPT 1 'SENT TO: nlscontact@ffn.com 'Dear Brian Smith##, ' 'Welcome to FreedomPlus and congratulations on your loan. We would like the opportunity to 'speak with you so that we can confirm the details of your newly funded loan and ensure you 'have the correct contact information for Customer Service. Please contact us via telephone 'at (800) 297-5879 Monday - Friday 7AM - 5PM MST to complete this call. Customer Service can 'also be reached via email at customersupport@freedomplus.com, should you have any questions 'along the way. ' 'Thank you for choosing FreedomPlus. We appreciate your business. ' 'Sincerely, ' 'FreedomPlus Customer Service"/> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
loannumb = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Lcount = Lcount + 1
Loop NLSApp.MessageBox("Welcome Call Email Processing Completed.") End Sub"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="Set CurrInt to Zero" Script="loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") 'currint = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CURRINTAMT") currint = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT current_interest_balance from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno ) currpayoff = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT current_payoff_balance from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno )
If loanrefno = "" Then loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("TASK_NLS_REFNO") End If
If Not currint =< .01 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Current interest on this loan is $" & Round( currint,2) & " and is above the allowable threshhold for this opperation." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "The opperation has been cancelled.") Else If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Current Interest on this loan is $" & currint & "." & chr(13) & "Are you sure you want to Set interest balance on this loan to ZERO?") Then ZeroCurrentInt(loanrefno) NLSApp.MessageBox("Interest set to zero.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Interest unchanged.") end If End if
If Not currpayoff =< .02 Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Current Pay Off on this loan is $" & Round(currpayoff,2) & " and is above the allowable threshhold for this opperation." & chr(13) & chr(13) & "The opperation has been cancelled.") Else If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("Current Pay Off on this loan is $" & currpayoff & "." & chr(13) & "Are you sure you want to Set total balance on this loan to ZERO?") Then ZeroCurrentpayOff(loanrefno) NLSApp.MessageBox("Pay Off set to zero.") Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Pay Off unchanged.") end If End if
Function ZeroCurrentInt(refno)
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_interest_balance = 0 where acctrefno = " & refno)
End Function
Function ZeroCurrentpayOff(refno)
NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct SET current_payoff_balance = 0 where acctrefno = " & refno)
End Function"/> <BUTTON Name="importemailtest" Script="importtest()
Sub importtest() acctrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") importxmltxt = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag='1' AcctRefno='" & acctrefno & "' >" & chr(13) & _ " <LOANDETAIL2 UserDefined278='34'/>" & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
If PendingCompleteClosureImportXML( importxmltxt, acctrefno) = "" Then emailbody = "Dear " & name & chr(13) & _ "Your loan now has a $0 balance And the automatic ACH payments have been discontinued." & chr(13) & _ "We would Like to thank you for choosing Freedom Plus." & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "Warmest regards," & chr(13) & _ "FreedomPlus Servicing" & chr(13) & _ "Phone: 800-297-5897"
NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3","smuhammad@bills.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Your loan now has a $0 balance",emailbody NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3","NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com", "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", "Your loan now has a $0 balance",emailbody End If
NLSApp.RefreshScreen()
End Sub
Function PendingCompleteClosureImportXML(xml, refno) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then errormsg = NLSApp.GetErrorString() subject = "Pending Complete Loan Closure IMPORT FAILURE!" toaddress1 = "smuhammad@bills.com" toaddress2 ="NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com" body1 = "Acctrefno: " & refno & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & "Import Error: " & chr(13) & errormsg & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & "Import text: " & CHR(13) & xml NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress1, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 'NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress2, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 End If PendingCompleteClosureImportXML = errormsg & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else PendingCompleteClosureImportXML = "" End If End Function"/> <BUTTON Name="script user updates" Script="modupdatesql = "Select 0; Update loanacct_mod_history set mod_uid = 0 where mod_uid = 39 and mod_datestamp > '09/14/17'" & _ "and acctrefno in (163191,163192,163194,163196,163197,163198,163199,163200,163201,163202)" NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(modupdatesql )"/> <BUTTON Name="emailtest2" Script="msgbox(NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email FROM NLSusers where signonid = '" & NLSApp.GetSignedOnID() & "'"))"/> <BUTTON Name="transdelcleanup" Script="transdelsql ="select 0; DELETE From loanacct_trans_history" & chr(13)& _ " " & chr(13)& _ "Where" & chr(13)& _ "transrefno in ( " & chr(13)& _ " SELECT " & chr(13)& _ " top 10" & chr(13)& _ " transrefno" & chr(13)& _ " from " & chr(13)& _ " loanacct_trans_history" & chr(13)& _ " Where" & chr(13)& _ " transaction_code in ('541','540','448','452')" & chr(13)& _ " and transaction_date > = '10/03/17'" & chr(13)& _ " and enteredby_uid <> 0" & chr(13)& _ " and reversal_transrefno > 0" & chr(13)& _ " and acctrefno = 43813 " & chr(13)& _ " ) "
'msgbox(transdelsql) NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(transdelsql)"/> <BUTTON Name="modhistcleanup" Script="modhistdelsql ="select 0; DELETE From loanacct_mod_history" & chr(13)& _ " " & chr(13)& _ "Where" & chr(13)& _ "row_id in ( " & chr(13)& _ " SELECT " & chr(13)& _ " --top 2" & chr(13)& _ " row_id" & chr(13)& _ " from " & chr(13)& _ " loanacct_mod_history" & chr(13)& _ " Where" & chr(13)& _ " item_changed like '%status%'" & chr(13)& _ " and (new_value like '%PENDING COMPLETE%' or old_value like '%PENDING COMPLETE%' ) " & chr(13)& _ " and mod_datestamp between '10/04/2017 08:00:00' and '10/04/2017 13:30:00' " & chr(13)& _ " and mod_uid not in (39, 0) " & chr(13)& _ " and acctrefno = 43813 ) "
msgbox(modhistdelsql) NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement(modhistdelsql)"/> <BUTTON Name="AutoCloseaddCompleted" Script="AutoCloseaddCompletedX() NLSApp.MessageBox("Completed")
Sub AutoCloseaddCompletedX() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Close Loans in COMPLETE PENDING status for prescribed waiting period or more and queue up ZERO Balance letter for printing or email ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' xmlsql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cd.userdef27 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'")
closurexml = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(xmlsql)
If len(closurexml) = 0 Then closurexml = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Do Until closurexml = "***END OF RESULT***" refno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() template = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() SendToQueue = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() emailtoaddr = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() name = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn()
If PendingCompleteClosureImportXML(closurexml, refno) = "" Then
'Expected XML string output Format: '<NLS> ' <TRANSACTIONS> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="462" EffectiveDate="07/21/17" LoanNumber="APP-00999999" Amount="537.43" /> ' </TRANSACTIONS> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="APP-00999999" LoanStatusCode="CLOSED" ClosedDate="07/21/17" > ' <LOANSTATUSES Operation="DELETE" LoanStatusCode="PENDING COMPLETE" EffectiveDate="07/21/17"/> ' <LOANSTATUSES Operation="ADD" LoanStatusCode="COMPLETED" EffectiveDate="07/21/17"/> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
Set DT = NLSApp.GetDocumentTemplates(template) DT.GenerateDocument refno, "TRUE", "SERVICING NOTES", SendToQueue, "T:\Temp\"
' commentupdatesql = "Select 0; update loanacct_comments set created_by = 0,userdef01 = 'Outbound',userdef02 = 'Zero Balance Letter',userdef03 = 'Email' " & _ ' "where comment_description in ('CPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER','FPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER') " & _ ' "and created_by <> 0 and created > left(getdate(),11) and acctrefno = " & refno
' nlsapp.sqlselectstatement(commentupdatesql)
If SendToQueue = "FALSE" Then If template = 5 Then emailbody = "Dear " & name & chr(13) & _ "Your loan now has a $0 balance And the automatic ACH payments have been discontinued." & chr(13) & _ "We would Like to thank you for choosing Freedom Plus." & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "Warmest regards," & chr(13) & _ "FreedomPlus Servicing" & chr(13) & _ "Phone: 800-297-5897"
NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Servicing FPlus", emailtoaddr, "customersupport@freedomplus.com", "Your loan now has a $0 balance", emailbody End If If template = 6 Then emailbody = "Dear " & name & chr(13) & _ "Your loan now has a $0 balance And the automatic ACH payments have been discontinued." & chr(13) & _ "We would Like to thank you for choosing Concolidation Plus." & chr(13) & chr(13) & _ "Warmest regards," & chr(13) & _ "Consolidation Plus Servicing" & chr(13) & _ "Phone: 1-888-950-4829"
NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Servicing CPlus", emailtoaddr, "consolplus-servicing@consolplus.com", "Your loan now has a $0 balance", emailbody End If
End If Else 'PLACEHOLDER 'NLSApp.MessageBox("There was a problem with refno " & refno & ".") End If closurexml = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext() If NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() = 39 Then 'NLSApp.MessageBox(closurexml) End If Loop
commentupdatesql = "Select 0; update loanacct_comments set created_by = 0,userdef01 = 'Outbound',userdef02 = 'Zero Balance Letter',userdef03 = 'Email' " & _ "where comment_description in ('CPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER','FPLUS ZERO BALANCE LETTER') " & _ "and created_by <> 0 and created >= left(getdate(),11)"
nlsapp.sqlselectstatement(commentupdatesql)
'Update last/Next Run datetime and Last user record Runstamp = NOW() NextRun = Date() + 1 & " 8:00:00 AM" NextRun =NOW() UID = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo()
Cifupdate = "<NLS><CIF UpdateFlag='1'CIFNumber='AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'><CIFDETAIL CIFDetail6='Next Run: " & NextRun & "' CIFDetail7='Last Run: " & Runstamp & "' CIFDetail8=' UserID: " & UID & "' /></CIF></NLS>"
ImportXML(Cifupdate)
End Sub"/> <BUTTON Name="addupdates" Script="NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; UPDATE loanacct_mod_history SET mod_uid = 0, modification_description = '//VBScript// '+ char(13) + modification_description where row_id = 2686903") "/> <BUTTON Name="newWOaddPendComm" Script="AutoWOaddCompletePendingx()
Sub AutoWOaddCompletePendingx() ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' 'Automatic Write-off loan balances $10 or less set loan status to COMPLETE PENDING ''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' userno = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo() authuser = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(varchar(12),groupno) from nlsgroupmembers where userno = " & userno & " and groupno IN (11)") 'Current Authrized User group(s) 11-Admin
lookupallloanssql = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cd.userdef18 FROM cif c, cif_detail cd where c.cifno = cd.cifno and c.cifnumber = 'AUTO WRITEOFFCLOSE'") lookuponeloansql = lookupallloanssql & Chr(13) & "and l.acctrefno in (" & NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") & ")" lookupsql = lookuponeloansql
'Members of authorized user groups can opt to process all eligible loans If authuser <> "" Then 'If NLSApp.YseNoMessageBox("Select Yes to process all available loans.") Then lookupsql = lookupallloanssql 'End If End If
writeoffxml = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(lookupsql)
If len(writeoffxml) = 0 Then writeoffxml = "***END OF RESULT***" End If
Do Until writeoffxml = "***END OF RESULT***" refno = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() refnolist = refnolist & refno & ", "
AddWOandPendingComplete(writeoffxml & refno) 'Expected XML string output Format: '<NLS> ' <TRANSACTIONS> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="540" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="544" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="448" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' <TRANSACTIONCODE TransactionCode="452" EffectiveDate="07/05/17" LoanNumber="APP-00099999" Amount="8.84" /> ' </TRANSACTIONS> ' <LOAN UpdateFlag="1" LoanNumber="APP-00099999"> ' <LOANSTATUSES Operation="ADD" LoanStatusCode="PENDING COMPLETE" EffectiveDate="07/21/17"/> ' <LOANCOMMENTS Comment="Remaining loan balance written-off due to balance below $10. " Category="SERVICING NOTES" CommentDescription="Balance write-off" CreatedBy="0"/> ' </LOAN> '</NLS>
writeoffxml = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatementReadNext()
Loop
refnolist = "(" & Left(refnolist, Len(refnolist) - 2) & ")"
'RESET COMMENT, TRANSAcTION and MOD HISTORY userid to ADMINISTRATOR If SetAdminuser(refnolist) = -1 Then subject = "Pending Complete Admin update FAILURE!" toaddress = "NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com" '"somebody@bills.com" body1 = "Acctrefno: " & refno & CHR(13) & "Update Error setting script user to Admin. Please investigate." NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 End If
End Sub
Function AddWOandPendingComplete(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString() endmark = "</NLS>" refno = Mid(xml, InStr(xml, endmark) + len(endmark), len(xml) - InStr(xml, endmark) + len(endmark))
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then errormsg = NLSApp.GetErrorString() subject = "Pending Complete Loan Closure process IMPORT FAILURE!" toaddress = "NLSErrors@freedomdebtrelief.com" '"somebody@bills.com" body1 = "Acctrefno: " & refno & CHR(13) & "Import Error: " & chr(13) & errormsg & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) NLSApp.SendEmailMessage "Loan Servicing3", toaddress, "svc.loanservicing@freedomdebtrelief.com", subject, body1 End If AddWOandPendingComplete = errormsg & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("") AddWOandPendingComplete = "" End If End Function"/> <BUTTON Name="deletes task data" Script="NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT 0; **###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Detail 2 UDF45 update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF16(C+) and Loan Detail 1 UDF29(F+) Field label name Investor sale date ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to maintain detail2 udef45 in sync with loan ach_co set up for the purpose of assuring the webpaay portal can see the current code for each new online reqiest. ' ' Created: 07/18/2017 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History NA
class_2 = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CLASS2") port = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") 'ACH_no = ACHCoIDUDF45(class_2,port) Curr_ACH_Co_UDF45 = NLSApp.GetField ("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45") If ACH_no <> Curr_ACH_Co_UDF45 Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF45", ACH_no End If

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'Field Level Script----------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before Input 'After Input 'When Field Changes '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ' Mail Paper Statement checkbox update - This is triggered by the When Field Changes event ' ' Location of script: Loan Detail 1 UDF18 (Plus Portfolio) ' ' Purpose: ' Designed to keep the CIF MailPaperstatement check box always in sync with the loan Mail Paper Statement checkbox. ' ' Created: 04/18/20126 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History 05/26/16 By SM ' Modification History 06/26/16 By SM ' Modification History 09/25/18 By SM '''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''''' ELCommUpdate()
Sub ELCommUpdate() loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") loancif = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_CIFNUMBER") loanport = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_PORTFOLIO") loancifno = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT cast(cifno as varchar) from cif where cifnumber = '" & loancif & "'") email1 = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT email,email2 from cif where cifnumber = '" & loancif & "'") email2 = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatementNextColumn() 'msgbox(loanport) If loanport = "PLUS PORTFOLIO" Then statement2 = "NONE" boxchecked = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF18") cifboxchecked = "CIFDetail7" Else statement2 = "NONE" boxchecked = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF17") cifboxchecked = "CIFDetail3" End If
If boxchecked = "CHECK" Then boxvalue = "1" OptionFlagS = "1" OptionFlagL = "1" Else If not email1 = "" Then boxvalue = "0" OptionFlagS = "2" OptionFlagL = "2" statement2 = "NONE" Else If NLSApp.YesNoMessageBox("NO EMAIL ADDRESS ON RECORD." & chr(10) & "You cannot end MAIL ONLY without adding an email address First." & chr(10)& chr(10) & "Do you want to add one now?") then newemail = addnewemail(loancif,1) If newemail = "" Then canceladdemail loanport, loanref Else OptionFlagS = "2" NLSapp.AddModificationHistory 1, loanref, curremail1,newemail, "Primary Email" NLSapp.AddModificationHistory 0, loancifno, curremail1,newemail, "Primary Email (from loan detail1)" End If Else canceladdemail loanport, loanref Exit sub End if End if End If
xmlstrng1 = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <CIF UpdateFlag =""1"" CIFNumber = """ & loancif & """>" & chr(13) & _ " <CIFDETAIL " & cifboxchecked & " = """ & boxvalue & """/>" & chr(13) & _ " </CIF>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>" xmlstrng2 = "<NLS>" & chr(13) & _ " <LOAN UpdateFlag = ""1"" AcctRefno =""" & loanref & """ >" & chr(13) & _ " <COMMUNICATION>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " <ALERT AlertType=""Statement"" OptionFlags=""" & OptionFlagS & """/> " & chr(13) & _ " </ALERTS>" & chr(13) & _ " </COMMUNICATION> " & chr(13) & _ " </LOAN>" & chr(13) & _ "</NLS>"
' " '<ALERT AlertType=""LateNotice"" OptionFlags=""" & OptionFlagL & """/> " & chr(13) & _ 'msgbox(xmlstrng2)
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng1) ImportXML(xmlstrng2) End Sub 'On Field Refresh 'On Initialize 'On Button click 'Form Level Script------------------------------------------------------------------------- 'Before save 'Before Activate 'Before Create 'On Delete 'After Save 'After Create 'On Add Button Clicked 'Local Functions

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' Automatic data chnages - When Field Changes - Field Level/C+ UDF37/F+ UDF11 ' ' Purpose: ' Update last update UDF fiels and save record of chnage in loan comments ' ' Created: 06/09/20126 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History NA By ' '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- CurrentDate = Now() LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'C+ Options 'NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF38", CurrentDate 'WCAgent = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF37") 'WCdate = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF38") 'WCStatus = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF44") 'F+ Options
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF12", CurrentDate WCAgent = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF11") WCdate = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF12") WCStatus = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF7")
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
If not right(WCAgent,9) = "COMPLETED" THEN
notes = "Additional Notes:" & chr(13) &addnotes commenthd = "Welcome Call Attempt " & right(WCAgent ,2)
XMLA = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?><NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" XMLB = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & LoanNo & """>" XMLC = "<LOANCOMMENTS Comment=""" & commenthd & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""WC Activity""/></LOAN></NLS>"
xmlstrng = XMLA & XMLB & XMLC
'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng)
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng) End if

' ' Created: 06/09/20126 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History NA By ' '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- UserID = NLSApp.GetCurrentUserNo( )
SQLtxt = "SELECT username+' - '+shortname FROM nlsusers, CIF WHERE CIFno IN ('51973','51974','51975','51976') AND userno = " & UserID
NLSapp.LoadComboList 0, "LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF11", SQLtxt**###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**CurrentDate = Now() NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6", CurrentDate
'Script to update credit bureau loan account reporting based on loan status changes.
LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") StatusCat = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF9") lastupdate = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6") loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") statuscode = NLSApp.GetField("STATUS_CODE")
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6", Now()
XMLA = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?><NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" XMLB = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=" & chr(34) & LoanNo & chr(34) & ">"
Select Case StatusCat Case "Deceased Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU ECOACode=""X""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case "BK Chpt 7 Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus="""" ConsumerInfoIndicator=""A "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case "BK Chpt 13 Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus="""" ConsumerInfoIndicator=""D "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case "Fraud Confirmed" XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus=""DF"" ConsumerInfoIndicator="" "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" Case Else XMLC = "<CREDITBUREAU AccountStatus="""" ConsumerInfoIndicator="" "" ECOACode=""""></CREDITBUREAU></LOAN></NLS>" End Select
xmlstrng = XMLA & XMLB & XMLC
NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF7",xmlstrng
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
'xmlstrng = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF7") 'lastupdate = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF6") 'loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") 'StatusCat = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF9")
'IF Not lastupdate = Null Then ' If loanstatus = "CLOSED" Then ' IF DateValue(lastupdate) = DateValue(Now) Then If StatusCat = "Deceased Confirmed" Or StatusCat = "BK Chpt 7 Confirmed" Or StatusCat = "BK Chpt 13 Confirmed" Or StatusCat = "Fraud Confirmed" Then ImportXML(xmlstrng) End If ' End If ' End If 'End If
Function ImportXML(xml) NLSApp.ClearErrorString()
If Not NLSApp.ImportXMLRecord(xml) Then If True Then NLSApp.MessageBox(xml & CHR(13) & NLSApp.GetErrorString()) End If ImportXML = NLSApp.GetErrorString() & CHR(13) & CHR(13) & xml & CHR(13) Else ' NLSApp.MessageBox("ECOA Status Updated.") ImportXML = "" End If End Function**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ' WC completed data changes - When Field Changes - Field Level/C+ UDF44/F+ UDF07 ' ' Purpose: ' Update last update UDF fields and save record of change in loan comments ' ' Created: 06/09/20126 by Stanley Muhammad ' Modification History NA By ' '--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- NLSapp.ClearErrorString() LoanNo = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") loanref = NLSapp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO") WCAgent = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF11") WCdate = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF12") WCStatus = NLSApp.Getfield("LOAN_DETAIL1_UDF7")
addnotes = InputBox("Additional Info?" & chr(13) & "Leave blank if nothing to add." , "WC Status Notes", defaultdate,4550,4550)
if len(addnotes) = 0 Then addnotes = "N/A" end if
notes = "Additional Notes:" & chr(13) &addnotes commenthd = "Welcome Call completed." & chr(13)
XMLA = "<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8"" standalone=""yes"" ?><NLS EnforceTagExistence=""1"">" XMLB = "<LOAN UpdateFlag=""1"" LoanNumber=""" & LoanNo & """>" XMLC = "<LOANCOMMENTS Comment=""" & commenthd & WCStatus & chr(13) & notes & """ Category=""SERVICING NOTES"" CommentDescription=""WC Activity""/></LOAN></NLS>"
xmlstrng = XMLA & XMLB & XMLC
'NLSApp.MessageBox(xmlstrng)
NLSApp.SaveScreen()
ImportXML(xmlstrng)**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

USERDEFFIELDS.script:
**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###**'LOAN variables loanstatus = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_STATUS") loannumber = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_NUMBER") getmodtype = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF5") loanrefno = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_REFNO")
'Task variables templateno = 7 'LOAN MODIFICATION II defaultstatusno = 7 'STARTED
'Change Start a Loan Modification Request field (UDF5) back to default "Choose an Option" NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF5", "Choose an Option" NLSApp.RefreshScreen()
If Not getmodtype = "Choose an Option" Then If addloanMod(getmodtype, loanrefno, loanstatus) = "" Then End If End If NLSApp.SaveScreen()
Function addloanMod(modtype, loanrefno, status)
'TASK variables currate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(7,2),current_interest_rate))+'%' from loanacct where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currpmt = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("SELECT '$' + convert(varchar(6),convert( numeric(9,2), next_payment_total_amount)) from loanacct_payment where acctrefno = " & loanrefno) currdate = NLSApp.SQLSelectStatement("select convert(char(10),getdate(),111)") currdatetime = NOW()
'User input for modification requestor Options a. borrower, b. co-borrower, c. 3rd party requestpromt = "Who is requesting the " & getmodtype & "?" & chr(13) & chr(13) & "A - Borrower" & chr(13) & "B - Co-Borrower" & chr(13) & "C - Third party" requestorcode = InputBox(requestpromt, "Requestor", "A")
'Borrower/Co-borrower detail sql lookups borrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, loanacct l where l.cifno = c.cifno and l.acctrefno = " & loanrefno coborrowerlookupsql = "select mail_name1 + char(13) + street_address1 + char(13) + city + ' ' + state + ', ' + zip from cif c, cif_loan_relationship clr where clr.cifno = c.cifno and clr.acctrefno = " & loanrefno
'Previous approved deferral lookup prevdeflookupsql = "SELECT count(t.task_refno) from task t, task_detail td where t.task_refno = td.task_refno AND t.status_code_id = 8 AND t.task_template_no = 7 AND td.userdef01 = 'Deferral' AND t.NLS_refno = " & loanrefno
Select Case requestorcode Case "A", "a" requestor = "Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(borrowerlookupsql) Case "B", "b" requestor = "Co-Borrower" requestordetail = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(coborrowerlookupsql) If requestordetail = "" Then NLSApp.MessageBox("Co-Borrower information cannot be located." & chr(13) & "Please validate that Co-borrower exists and Retry.") NLSApp.MessageBox("Operation Canceled.") Exit Function End If Case "C", "c" requestor = "Third_Party (See Notes)" requestordetail = "ENTER 3rd Party details here." Case "" NLSApp.MessageBox("Modification Canceled.") Exit Function Case Else NLSApp.MessageBox("Invalid Selection." & chr(13) & "Please Try Again.") Exit Function End Select
'If Mod Type is a deferral look up the # of previously approved deferrals If getmodtype = "Deferral" Then prevdefs = NLSapp.SQLSelectStatement(prevdeflookupsql) Else prevdefs = "" End If
'TASK OBJECT CREATION If status = "ACTIVE" Then Set Task = NLSApp.Tasks.New(templateno) NLSApp.Tasks.BeginTransaction Task.StatusCodeID = defaultstatusno Task.NLSRefno = loanrefno Task.UDF1 = modtype Task.UDF9 = prevdefs Task.UDF10 = currpmt Task.UDF12 = currdate Task.UDF14 = currate Task.UDF18 = requestor Task.UDF23 = currdate Task.UDF25 = requestordetail
If (Task.Save = -1) Then NLSApp.Tasks.RollbackTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Task not created.") addloanMod = -1 Else NLSApp.Tasks.CommitTransaction NLSApp.MessageBox("Loan Modification TASK created." & Chr(13) & "Please go the the Task Tab to complete the modification record.") addloanMod = "" End If Else NLSApp.MessageBox("The Loan must be in ACTIVE status to add a Modification task") End If
End Function**###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**

**###BEFORE_INPUT###****###BEFORE_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###AFTER_INPUT###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###WHEN_FIELD_CHANGE###****###BUTTON_CLICKED###**<BUTTONS ExecScriptOnChange="0"> <BUTTON Name="" Script="PastDue = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DAYSPASTDUE") ITP = NLSApp.GetField("LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF10") CurrentDate = Now()
If PastDue = 0 Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","CURRENT" End If If (PastDue > 0) AND (PastDue <= 10) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","0-10" End If If (PastDue > 10) AND (PastDue <= 30) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","11+" End If If (PastDue > 30) AND (PastDue <= 60) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","30+" End If If (PastDue > 60) AND (PastDue <= 90) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","60+" End If If (PastDue > 90) AND (PastDue <= 120) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","90+" End If If (PastDue > 120) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF1","120+" End If
If (PastDue > 0) AND (PastDue <= 10) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","N/A" End If If (PastDue > 11) AND (PastDue <= 120) Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","Collections" End If If (PastDue > 120) AND (ITP = "NO") Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","Defaulted" End If If (PastDue > 120) AND (ITP <> "NO") Then NLSApp.SetField "LOAN_DETAIL2_UDF2","Collections" End If"/> </BUTTONS> **###BUTTON_CLICKED###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_FIELD_REFRESH###****###ON_INITIALIZE###****###ON_INITIALIZE###**
